text: Giraffoidea is a superfamily that contains Climacoceratidae and Giraffidae. The only living members are giraffes and okapis. == Classification == * Superfamily Giraffoidea ** Family † Climacoceratidae *** †Climacoceras *** †Orangemeryx *** †Prolibytherium *** †Propalaeoryx *** †Nyanzameryx *** †Sperrgebietomeryx ** Family Giraffidae *** †Canthumeryx *** †Georgiomeryx *** †Mitilanotherium *** †Shansitherium *** Subfamily Sivatheriinae **** †Bramatherium **** †Decennatherium **** †Helladotherium **** †Sivatherium *** Subfamily Giraffinae **** Tribe Giraffini ***** Subtribe Giraffina ****** Giraffa ***** Subtribe Bohlinina ****** †Bohlinia ****** †Honanotherium **** Tribe Palaeotragini ***** Subtribe Palaeotragina ****** †Giraffokeryx ****** †Palaeotragus ****** †Samotherium ***** Subtribe Okapiina ****** Okapia including the okapi, Okapia johnstoni Category:Even-toed ungulates
title: Giraffoidea
